meanings.definition: A prize or other mark of recognition given in honor of an achievement.
meanings.sent1: She received an award for being the best student in her class.
meanings.sent2: The award ceremony was a special event for all the winners.
meanings.sent3: The award for the fastest eater went to the squirrel with the bushiest tail.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an award, brightening up the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The shiny trophy was the perfect award for his hard work and dedication.

meanings.definition: To give or bestow as a result of merit or achievement.
meanings.sent1: The principal will award the scholarship to the most deserving student.
meanings.sent2: They decided to award him with a promotion for his excellent performance.
meanings.sent3: The cat jokingly tried to award the title of 'best meower' to the dog.
meanings.sent4: The sun seemed to award the flowers with extra brightness in the morning.
meanings.sent5: The judge will award the winner of the competition with a shiny medal.
